numbered_ace_sentences: 2. A legacy student is 7 times more likely to be admitted to a university than a non-legacy student if the legacy student has a very high income.
3. A legacy student can have a high chance of admission even if the legacy student is not wealthy.
4. A legacy student has a higher chance of admission than a non-legacy student if the non-legacy student has a high income.
5. A legacy student has a higher chance of admission than a non-legacy student if the non-legacy student has a low income.
6. I wonder which specific schools were used to gather the data.
7. I wonder whether an admission profile plays a role for a legacy student.
8. I wonder whether the role of an admission profile changes for a legacy student.
9. This relates to the fact that legacy students have high priority.
10. Many schools that are close to me value legacy status.
11. The headline is: Legacy applicants admission chances versus non-legacy applicants.
